node.text: For 23 years, Harpoon has been the Official Beer Sponsor of the Pan-Mass Challenge. This year, we are proud to share that from July 1st to August 15th, for every Harpoon IPA purchased, we will be donating a portion of the proceeds to the @panmass 🍻 Meet the PMC riders who will be featured on Harpoon IPA bottles, and be sure to stock up on IPA this summer!

node.title: Harpoon IPA: Giving Back to the PMC

node.text: Introducing Team Mew-S-A! Made in collaboration with USWNT stars (and MA natives) @kmewis19 and @sammymewyy , this wicked crushable IPA is brewed with lime peel, lemon purée, and sea salt, and a portion of proceeds for every 4-pack sold will be donated to the @bgcdorchester - the charity of Kristie and Sam's choice. Available now at our Boston brewery, and shipping out to our Vermont brewery and stores starting later this week! Click the link in our bio to learn more. #harpoonbrewery #craftbeer

node.text: Introducing Don’t Poke The Bears, a Black & Gold American Pils brewed with hometown hockey heroes @charliecoyle_3 and @chriswags21, featuring black honey, goldpils malt, and some clutch brew day help from some special guests. Keep an eye out for Don’t Poke The Bears— available at our breweries and shipping out across New England this week! A portion of proceeds from each 4-pack sold will be donated to @coreycgriffinfoundation, the charity of Wags and Coyle’s choice.

node.text:
Every year the province of Nova Scotia presents the @CityOfBoston
 with its official @TreeforBoston - we brewed a beer with @BigSpruceBrew to toast to the occasion 🍻

A smoked Abbey Ale brewed with spruce tips and aged in Single Malt Canadian Whiskey barrels from @glenbretonrare, From Nova Scotia With Love is a tribute to this annual holiday tradition and the century-long friendship behind it. Shipping out now to select markets!

node.text: What does it mean to be employee owned and why is it so awesome? Pour yourself a pint of employee owned beer and watch to find out 🍻 Cheers to Employee Ownership Month and l of our fellow ESOP breweries!

node.text: In honor of the 19th year of the Harpoon 5-Miler, we made a special video to honor the people that we run for: those that have battled, and are battling, ALS. Please take a moment to enjoy our Faces of ALS® video, and thank you to our participants who helped bring this video to life by sharing these photos of their loved ones. #FacesofALS #FightALS #Harpoon5Miler

node.text: Meet Glynn Hawley, Pan-Mass Challenge's Director of Provisions and Logistics and longtime @panmass rider. From July 1st to August 15th, for every Harpoon IPA purchased, we will be donating a portion of the proceeds to the PMC! Be sure to pick up a 6-pack this weekend 🍻 You can also enter to win a Harpoon IPA kegerator! Text “HarpoonPMC” to 77948 to enter. Contest ends on August 16th. #PMC2021 #harpoonhelps

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Harpoon Brewery on August 11, 2021. May be an image of drink.

node.text: Forget peanuts and cracker jacks— we want lager and big hops! Squeezing in a @gowoosox game before the summer’s over? Be sure to swing by the Harpoon Taps at the Worcester Wall for a full line up of Harpoon beer, featuring our Worcester-only release: WooSox Lager! #GoWooSox

Photo by Harpoon Brewery on August 11, 2021. May be an image of drink.
Photo by Harpoon Brewery in Allston Christmas. May be an image of text that says 'EMPLOYEE OWNED TOWAREA HARPOON ALLSTON X-MAS INDIA PALE ALE 7ALCT %ALC/VOL 40IBUS EST H'.

node.text:
Pour some out for the rats— Allston X-Mas is back! Brewed in the spirit of repurposing and to honor Boston's favorite unofficial holiday, this New England IPA is brewed with an array of leftover brewhouse ingredients (albeit high quality leftover brewhouse ingredients!) that would have otherwise gone to waste. Citrusy, tropical, and refreshingly dry with a rye-like spice, Allston X-Mas is best enjoyed on a worn-in couch after a long day of unpacking. 
...
Are you moving Sept. 1st? Don't sleep in your moving truck August 31st - we want to hook you up with a voucher for a hotel room at @hyattplace Boston in the Seaport and give you a $100 gift card to the @harpoonbeerhall! All you have to do is post your packing selfie to Instagram, tag @harpoonbrewery, and use the hashtag #allstonxmasgiveaway by midnight on August 23rd to enter for a chance to win! Click the link in our bio to see the official rules! 
...
Available now at both our breweries and shipping this week to limited accounts around Boston! Drink responsibly. Don't take Storrow.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Harpoon Brewery on August 06, 2021. May be an image of 1 person, standing, drink, indoor and text that says 'ARPOR IPA HARPOON EDGESTAR NEW ENGLAND'S ORIGINAL IPA EMPLOYEE OWNED HARPOON IPA CRISP HOPPY BALANCED 6.0%ALC/VOL'.

node.text:
To celebrate the Pan-Mass Challenge this weekend we are giving away TWO Harpoon IPA kegerators! There are two ways to enter:

@panmass Riders: Post a photo of your post-ride Harpoon IPA on Instagram and tag @harpoonbrewery and @panmass by Sunday, August 8th at 5pm.

Not a rider? Enter here: Text “HarpoonPMC” to 77948. Contest ends on August 16th.

To be eligible to enter you must be 21+. Please note that the winner must be able to pick up the kegerator from the Harpoon Brewery at 306 Northern Avenue Boston, MA.

node.text: Thank you to all of the musicians, food vendors, and of course attendees who made #HarpoonFest 2021 so much fun! Not only did we have a great time together, but we also raised $6,304 for @offtheirplate 🍻 Stay tuned for more events coming soon 👀

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Harpoon Brewery on August 02, 2021. May be an image of 1 person and standing.

node.text:
🚲 GIVEAWAY 🚲 We've teamed up with fellow @panmass sponsor and local Employee-Owned company, @landrysbicycles, to giveaway a free Ride-Ready tune-up ($100 value), a Harpoon swag pack and a helmet from our friends at @bernhelmets. To Enter:
.
1. Follow @harpoonbrewery
.
2. Follow @landrysbicycles
.
3. Tag a friend!
.
Winners must be based in New England and be following @harpoonbrewery and @landrysbicycles to qualify! Competition runs: 8/2/21 - 8/4/21. Winners announced on 8/5/21.

node.text: Meet Nicaela Chinnaswamy, longtime @panmass rider and volunteer. You can find her story on the back labels of Harpoon IPA this summer 🍻 Click the link in our bio to learn more about how we're supporting the PMC with Harpoon IPA! #PMC2021 #harpoonhelps

node.text:
UPDATE 3:45PM: A LIMITED AMOUNT OF TICKETS ARE NOW AVAILABLE - SNAG THEM WHILE YOU CAN THROUGH THE LINK IN OUR BIO!

Don't have #HarpoonFest tickets yet? What are you waiting for?! We have plenty of tickets available for tonight, but Saturday is looking like it will sell out very soon! If Saturday sells out, we will NOT be selling tickets at the door - so make sure you get your tickets while you still can! Click the link in our bio to purchase them now 🍻

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Harpoon Brewery on July 22, 2021. May be a cartoon of text that says 'RETURN OF THE FEST EMPLOYE WNED HARPOON IPA H ប HARPOONFEST2021'.

node.text:
We can't wait to see you all at HarpoonFest! Here are some FAQs to be aware of before the weekend:
• Thursday's session is SOLD OUT - there will NOT be tickets available at the door
• Harpoonfest passes are NON-refundable
• We are unable to exchange tickets purchased for one day to another day - so please make sure you purchase the correct day
• You are able to transfer a pass to a friend! Just forward them the ticket – no need to worry about calling us or changing the name on the pass
• Not planning to come to Fest but want to visit the Beer Hall? The Beer Hall will be open (indoors only) regular hours on Thursday, open from 12PM -4PM on Friday, closed on Saturday
...
We highly encourage you to purchase tickets ahead of time! We cannot guarantee that passes will be available day-of – and if you are planning to purchase day-of, you must purchase them before you get in line to enter the festival. Click the link in our bio to purchase your #harpoonfest passes!
